projects: [{"title":"Dream Vidyut (Data Analytics General Championship 2020,IIT Kharagpur)","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Jan 2020","description":"â€¢ Worked on a Time Series Dataset of electricity meter readings provided by Fractal Analytics.â€¢ Performed preliminary data preprocessing and Exploratory data analysis using boxplots, heat maps,correlation matrices and other plots using Tableau.â€¢ Detected & Replaced Anomalies for Robust Predictions.â€¢ Added new features as part of Feature Engineering, verified it using Hypothesis Testing(statistical T- Test).â€¢ Applied models of different classes such as Statistical(AR,MA,ARIMA),Machine learning(XGBoost) and Deep learning(GRU,LSTM,RNN) to forecast the meter readings of the next 4 months.â€¢ Stacked the predictions from GRU and Arima as no individual model performed well.After stacking GRU and ARIMA models, we get 15% better evaluation score as compared to GRU and a 39% better evaluation metric score as compared to ARIMA."}]
